import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; import './index.css'; function App() { const [showNav, setShowNav] = useState(true) return
setShowNav(!showNav)} />
